SELECT co.id, co.category_id, ca.product_type,co.name, co.images->>'$[0]' AS image, co.sales, MIN(va.price) as price FROM shop_component co JOIN shop_component_variant va ON co.id = va.component_id JOIN shop_category ca ON ca.id = co.category_id
and co.category_id = #{categoryId}
and co.name like concat('%',#{searchContent},'%')
GROUP BY co.id

SELECT co.id, co.category_id, ca.product_type, co.name, co.images ->> '$[0]' AS image, co.sales, MIN(va.price) as price FROM shop_component co JOIN shop_component_variant va ON co.id = va.component_id JOIN shop_category ca ON ca.id = co.category_id GROUP BY co.id union all select s.id, 0 as category_id, shop_category.product_type, s.name, s.images ->> '$[0]' AS image, s.sales, s.price from shop_bundle s join shop_category on shop_category.id = s.category_id order by sales desc
